headline: Maurel & Prom: Signing of an SPA for the Acquisition of Azule Energy’s Interests in Blocks 14 & 14K Offshore Angola
summary: PARIS, December 12, 2025--Regulatory News: Etablissements Maurel & Prom S.A. ("M&P", the "Group") (Paris:MAU) is pleased to announce that it has, together in a consortium with BW Energy Limited ("BW Energy"), signed a Sale and Purchase Agreement ("SPA") with Azule Energy Angola B.V. ("Azule Energy") for the joint acquisition of a 20% interest in Block 14 (10% net to M&P) and a 10% interest in Block 14K (5% net to M&P), both located offshore Angola.
